typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> MoviesDB
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> MovieDB3
MoviesDB filter(rlike(genres, 'Action')) ~> moviefilter
moviefilter select(mapColumn(
		movieId = movie
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MovieSelect
